txt.en: The monster you are attacking has no way to get to you at your present location, and has fled home.  Note that you will not get credit for battles won in this way.

The monster you are attacking has no way to get to you at your present location, and this is indicated by the question marks above its head. The monster will take no damage and will evade all attacks while in this state. If left in this state for too long, the monster will return home and heal to full health. Note that you will not get credit for battles won in this way.
